[[Version 1.2]]
*'''December 31, 2020''' - Fixes an error in Albedo's Constellation Lv. 2 "Opening of Phanerozoic" description (the actual effects of the Constellation in-game work as intended).
**{{Color|Old description:}}
:::Transient Blossoms generated by Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma grant Albedo Fatal Reckoning for 30s:
:::Each stack of Fatal Reckoning increases DMG by 30% of Albedo's DEF.
:::The effect stacks up to 4 times.
:::Unleashing Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide consumes all stacks of Fatal Reckoning, <span class="bg-highlight">increasing the DMG dealt by the Tectonic Tide and Fatal Blossoms based on the number of stacks consumed.</span>
**{{Color|New description:}}
:::Transient Blossoms generated by Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma grant Albedo Fatal Reckoning for 30s:
:::Unleashing Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide consumes all stacks of Fatal Reckoning. <span class="bg-highlight">Each stack of Fatal Reckoning consumed increases the DMG dealt by Fatal Blossoms and Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide's burst DMG by 30% of Albedo's DEF.</span>
:::This effect stacks up to 4 times.

*'''December 23, 2020''' - Albedo was released as a playable character with the [[Secretum Secretorum]] event [[wish]].
